issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Install Titanium. 
Download a sample application
Run the applicationt to trigger an error message : CLI is missing
Go to check for updates.
Install Node successfully
Install CL and get error Node is not installed appropriately.

h3. Actual Result
Node  is not installed properly

h3. Expected Result
CLI should install
fields.summary: Unable to install CLI on Mac Book

comments.body:
Please refer to: http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/145844/cant-install-titanium-cli-and-alloy
for possible related issue and fix.

What Mac OS version are you using?

I have seen this issue a couple times before and usually what is required is a clean install. Please try redownloading titanium from our main site at appcelerator.com and install from scratch and let me know if this fixed the problem.

Regards,
Carter
